title: How to Avoid Carrying Bed Bugs Home from an Infested Hotel Room

steps.headline: Bring a rubbing alcohol sprayer and a double side sticky tape with you.
steps.description: You should check tape’s performance by dropping an ant onto the tape.

steps.headline: Leave your luggage in the bathtub after you enter the hotel room.
Spray rubbing alcohol to wood chairs and tables only and then apply sticky tape to the legs of tables and chairs.
steps.description: Don't waste your effort to spray somewhere else.

steps.headline: You may apply stick tape to both ends of the bar in a closet.
steps.description: Use this bar for hanging clothing.

steps.headline: Leave your luggage and bags on top of chairs.
At night, sleep without wearing clothing and leave your clothing on top of a chair.
In the morning, take a shower the first thing.
If you receive bed bug bites, report it to hotel manager and receive refund.
On the checkout day, remove the sticky tape.
steps.description: You must use the tape without residue.

steps.headline: Check out with 100% confidence that you will not carry bed bugs to home even you have lived in an infested hotel room and received bed bug bites.

text: Bring a rubbing alcohol sprayer and a double side sticky tape with you. You should check tape’s performance by dropping an ant onto the tape. Leave your luggage in the bathtub after you enter the hotel room.  Spray rubbing alcohol to wood chairs and tables only and then apply sticky tape to the legs of tables and chairs. Don't waste your effort to spray somewhere else. You may apply stick tape to both ends of the bar in a closet. Use this bar for hanging clothing. Leave your luggage and bags on top of chairs. Don’t sit on sofa. At night, sleep without wearing clothing and leave your clothing on top of a chair.  In the morning, take a shower the first thing.  If you receive bed bug bites, report it to hotel manager and receive refund.  On the checkout day, remove the sticky tape. You must use the tape without residue. Check out with 100% confidence that you will not carry bed bugs to home even you have lived in an infested hotel room and received bed bug bites.
